verses.roman:
eṣa vai kila devakyāṁ
jāto nītaś ca gokulam
kālam etaṁ vasan gūḍho
vavṛdhe nanda-veśmani

synonyms: eṣaḥ—this (Kṛṣṇa); vai—certainly; kila—indeed; devakyām—from the womb of Devakī; jātaḥ—born; nītaḥ—brought; ca—and; gokulam—to Gokula; kālam—time; etam—this much; vasan—living; gūḍhaḥ—hidden; vavṛdhe—He grew up; nanda-veśmani—in the house of Nanda Mahārāja.
translation: This one [Kṛṣṇa] took birth from mother Devakī and was brought to Gokula, where He has remained concealed all this time, growing up in the house of King Nanda.
